creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons, in memory of Roberta Grodberg Simmons
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: Silk, cotton, natural brown cotton (cuyuscate) discontinuous supplementary weft patterning; natural brown cotton ground; red weft faced band at shoulders; dark blue velvet trim at neck and sleeves; alternating figural and geometric bands.
title: Woman's blouse (Huipil)
